name: azure-tts-raycast
title: Azure Speech TTS
description: Convert selected text to speech using Azure Speech Services with customizable voices and languages
author: liualexiang

commands.name: azure-speech
commands.title: Azure Speech TTS Extension
commands.description: Read selected text aloud using Azure TTS

preferences.name: speechKey
preferences.title: Azure Speech Key
preferences.description: Your Azure Speech Service subscription key
preferences.placeholder: Enter your Azure Speech subscription key

preferences.name: serviceRegion
preferences.title: Service Region
preferences.description: Azure service region (e.g., eastus2, westus, etc.)

preferences.name: voiceName
preferences.title: Voice Name
preferences.description: Azure TTS voice name (e.g., en-US-Emma2:DragonHDLatestNeural, en-US-JennyNeural)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
